sentence.text: Basic immunological assessments have confirmed that this strain of human CD3 EDG-replaced apoptotic process are entirely immune competent, and we have also demonstrated that a bispecific antibody that simultaneously binds to human CD3 and a tumor-associated antigen (e.g. signal transduction or regulation of canonical Wnt signaling pathway) can be evaluated in human CD3 EDG-replaced mice engrafted with tumors.

entity.text: regulation of canonical Wnt signaling pathway
